item.description: Update Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#1029; 04:29PM; 611 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HWq6Nf; Koreatown; Firefighters located a deceased (age/gender unknown at this time) person behind debris and file cabinets while searching the building. Excessive storage within the office units forced a delay in conducting a full search until the fire was extinguished. LAFD Arson and LAPD are conducting the investigation. LAFD PIO Firefighter David Ortiz is on scene for media availability. Media staging location is Sixth St just east of Catalina. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 BC9 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E26 E27 E29 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 PI2 RA13 RA29 RA803 RA829 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1029; 03:53PM; 611 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HWq6Nf; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 90 firefighters achieved a knockdown in 35 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters faced difficulties in reaching the fire, requiring a breach of the interior walls. All occupants (number unknown) were safely evacuated. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol. LAFD PIO Firefighter David Ortiz will be on scene shortly for media availability. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 BC9 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E26 E27 E29 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 PI2 RA13 RA29 RA803 RA829 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1029; 03:51PM; 611 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HWq6Nf; Koreatown; Firefighters had to breach interior walls to reach and get water on the fire located in two units on the 2nd floor of the (updated) four story commercial over parking. The office building is occupied but all have safely evacuated (number unknown). Crews are making good progress with no injuries reported.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 BC9 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E26 E27 E29 E52 E6 EM11 HR3 RA13 RA803 RA829 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1029; 03:18PM; 611 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HWq6Nf; Koreatown; Five story (sealed) office building with fire on the 2nd floor. Additional resources requested (not reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 E11 E13 E211 E229 E29 E6 RA13 RA829 T11 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Cliff Rescue, San Pedro; INC#0737; 12:43PM; 1 Point Fermin; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nw6hUE; San Pedro; LAFD Air Ops is conducting a hoist operation to rescue and transport a female (age unknown at this time) patient in critical condition. Update to initial alert, the fall (reported to be accidental) was approximately 100' down the cliff. No further details.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT17 BT4 BT5 E101 E205 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM6 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA101 RA85 RH114 T48 T5 T85 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Cliff Rescue, San Pedro; INC#0737; 12:10PM; 1 Point Fermin; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nw6hUE; San Pedro; Firefighters have made contact with a female (age and condition are unknown at this time) patient approximately 20-30 feet down the cliff. Resources are preparing for a possible hoist operation once the decision has been made for the best rescue method. ; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT17 BT4 BT5 E101 E205 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM6 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA101 RA85 RH114 T48 T5 T85 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0475; 10:11AM; 4211 E Verdant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t210Zq; Atwater Village; KNOCKDOWN: 37 firefighters (prior to the arrival of the additionally requested resources) extinguished the fire in 29 minutes with no injuries reported. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC10 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E203 E220 E233 E235 E250 E27 E42 E44 E55 E56 EM2 HR3 RA3 RA56 RA803 RA835 T20 T3 T33 T35 T50 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0475; 09:42AM; 4211 E Verdant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t210Zq; Atwater Village; Two story office building (metal clad roof) with fire on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 E235 E250 E55 E56 RA56 RA835 T35 T50; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0396; 09:22AM; 720 S Ceres Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3i36mNn; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 90 firefighters extinguished the fire in 40 minutes with no injuries reported. It is uncertain as to the nature of the business housed in the structure but appears to be only ordinary combustibles (no chemicals, etc). LAFD PIOs are on scene for media availability. LAFD Arson is responding for the cause investigation per protocol for a Greater Alarm. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR11 AR17 AR21 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM21 CM22 E1 E11 E14 E17 E20 E202 E209 E211 E221 E233 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 PI2 PI4 RA17 RA27 RA4 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T11 T2 T21 T27 T33 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0396; 09:16AM; 720 S Ceres Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3i36mNn; Downtown; Firefighters have made good progress against the blaze. Ladder pipe operations will shut down and an interior fire attack will resume to root out the remaining pockets of fire. PIOs Captain Branden Silverman and Firefighter David Ortiz are on scene for media availability. No injuries reported.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM21 CM22 E1 E11 E14 E17 E20 E202 E209 E211 E221 E233 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 PI2 PI4 RA17 RA27 RA4 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T11 T2 T21 T27 T33 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
